resources.string: GrammarScope (SyntaxNet) is a dependency parser. It parses sentences, analyses their syntactic structures (in the form of labelled dependencies) and displays its findings. It is powered by Google\'s SyntaxNet.

GrammarScope (UDPipe) is a dependency parser. It parses sentences, analyses their syntactic structures (in the form of labelled dependencies) and displays its findings. It is powered by UDPipe machine learning framework.

For each word, a tree graph is built, based on WordNet® data, that captures the word\'s relations to other words. The relation types are those to be found in the WordNet database and include: \'more specific\', \'more generic\', \'causes\', \'entails\', \'similar to\', \'opposite of\', \'part of\', \'whole of\', etc… Treebolic WordNet displays this graph, and gives it a hyperbolic rendering in which display space is subject to a particular curvature: more space is allocated to the focus node while the parent and children, still in the immediate visual context, appear slightly smaller. The grandparents and grandchildren are still visible but come out even smaller. As we move away from the focus node, less display space is allotted to the nodes, which gradually disappear towards the display\'s border. Touch-dragging word nodes allows the user to interact with the display and to browse through the graph\'s space by shifting the focus.

Semantikos explores senses and semantic roles of English. Linguistic data from WordNet, VerbNet, Propbank, FrameNet, BNC statistical data, Predicate Matrix. Textual search on samples, definitions, text occurrences.
Semantikos WordNet explores senses and semantic roles of English. Linguistic data from WordNet, BNC statistical data. Textual search on samples, definitions. Based on Princeton\'s WordNet database.

Semantikos English WordNet explores senses and semantic roles of English. Linguistic data from WordNet, BNC statistical data. Textual search on samples, definitions. Based on the English WordNet database.
Semantikos VerbNet explores senses and semantic roles of English. Linguistic data from VerbNet, PropBank and WordNet. Textual search on samples, definitions.
Semantikos FrameNet explores senses and semantic roles of English. Linguistic data from FrameNet. Textual search on sample sentences.
Semantikos SyntagNet explores senses and collocations. Linguistic data from SyntagNet. Textual search on sample sentences.
